message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM

This paper deals with deep learning techniques for mesh modeling and deformation, which is a common topic in computer graphics and computer vision. The use of autoencoders and graph convolutional networks suggests that the paper may belong to the computer vision (cs.CV) or computer graphics (cs.GR) sub-categories. The focus on non-rigid deformations and the use of a novel embedded deformation layer suggests that the paper may also be relevant to the machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) sub-categories. Finally, the multiple applications of the proposed method, including 3D reconstruction and surface tracking, suggest that the paper may also be relevant to the multimedia (cs.MM) sub-category.
